CustomField.description: AD-55 - flag to indicate if the task is open, not started, completed or overdue
CustomField.formula: CASE( Status, 'Completed', IMAGE('/resource/RAGFlagGreen', ' '), IF( ActivityDate < TODAY(), IMAGE('/resource/RAGFlagGIF', ' '), IF( ActivityDate = TODAY(), IMAGE('/resource/RAGFlagRed', ' '), IF( AND(ActivityDate > TODAY(), (ActivityDate - TODAY()) <= 2), IMAGE('/resource/RAGFlagAmber', ' '), IMAGE('/resource/RAGFlagAmber', ' ') ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Status Flag
